abstract.p: Website Results, Internet marketing technologies company, is acquired by 24/7 Media in stock transaction valued at $95 million (S)

block.p: 24/7 Media in New York, a global interactive media and technology services company, said yesterday that it had acquired Website Results in Los Angeles, an Internet marketing technologies company. The purchase was a stock transaction valued at $95 million. Website Results, with 36 employees and revenue estimated at $6 million for the first half of this year from clients like eBay and E*Trade, becomes an autonomous division of 24/7 Media. Douglas C. Wagner, 34, continues as president at Website Results.
